paths.name: assert
paths.message: Use `strict` instead. E.g. `import { strict as assert } from "node:assert";`

paths.name: node:assert
paths.message: Use `strict` instead. E.g. `import { strict as assert } from "node:assert";`

patterns.message: Importing from a parent index file tends to cause cyclic dependencies. Import from a more specific sibling file instead.

no-restricted-syntax.message: Exporting * is not permitted. You should export only named items you intend to export.
